description:

[b][size=5]Description[/size][/b]

This plugin seamlessly integrates Trust Wallet connection to your web, allowing the application to easily verify the wallet ownership and obtain wallet address, as well as switch between various blockchain networks. Supporting over 100 blockchain networks, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, and many others, it offers extensive compatibility and flexibility for managing digital assets across multiple chains.

This plugin is used in a very complex web3 product called [color=#1733AF][url=https://metla.com]metla.com[/color][/url] - please check it out to see it in action. 

üëõ Please support our efforts to keep this plugin free‚Äîyour donations help us invest the time and resources needed to continue maintaining and improving it for everyone's benefit:  [color=#1AAFD0][url=https://zeroqo.de/support]https://zeroqo.de/support[/color][/url].

[size=5][b]Features[/b][/size]

üöÄ Allows users to securely connect their Trust Wallet to Bubble apps.
üîó Allows users to change the chain ID. 
üåü Simplifies the authentication process for users with Trust Wallet.
üéØ Provides a seamless integration with Trust Wallet for a smooth user experience.
üì± Supports mobile devices, allowing users to easily connect their Trust Wallet on the go.
üåê Expands the reach of Bubble apps to the growing community of Trust Wallet users.

The most risk-free way to try out this plugin is to subscribe to it. If you unsubscribe a few days later you will be charged on pro-rata basis, so for example if the plugin monthly price is $5 then you‚Äôd pay only 17¬¢ per day ($5/30 days)!


[b][size=5]Plugin use cases[/size][/b]

üîí [b]Secure Wallet Connection[/b]
Establish a secure connection between Bubble app and Trust Wallet using Trust Wallet Connect plugin.

üë§ [b]User Authentication[/b]
Allow users to log in and authenticate their identity through Trust Wallet Connect plugin in the Bubble app.

üì≤ [b]Mobile Integration[/b]
Seamlessly integrate Trust Wallet Connect plugin for mobile users to access their wallet on the go through the Bubble app.

plugin_instructions:
